body.section:
The recommended IDE is eclipse because it is free and very popular. You can use an IDE of your choice instead but eclipse is the only IDE supported in this manual.
Simply download and extract the latest release of eclipse and you are ready to go. If you already use eclipse and want to use a separate workspace for this project you can start eclipse as following:
eclipse -data /some/other/workspace
Go to Window > Preferences > Java > Code Style > Code Templates and click the button Import.... Then choose the file mmm-setup/src/settings/eclipse/codetemplates.xml and proceed.
Go to Window > Preferences > Java > Code Style > Formatter and click the button Import.... Then choose the file mmm-setup/src/settings/eclipse/formatter.xml and proceed.
Go to Window > Preferences > Java > Code Style > Clean Up and click the button Import.... Then choose the file mmm-setup/src/settings/eclipse/cleanup.xml and proceed.
